name: shabam
description: A replica of the popular music-recognition app Shazam

scripts.rm-services:dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml rm -f proxy api client fingerprint_worker identification_worker
scripts.start:dev--recreate: npm run rm-services:dev && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev--recreate-proxy: npm run rm-services:dev-proxy && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev--recreate-client: npm run rm-services:dev-client && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev--recreate-api: npm run rm-services:dev-api && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev--recreate-fingerprint-worker: npm run rm-services:dev-fingerprint-worker && npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev--recreate-identification-worke: npm run rm-services:dev-identification-worker && npm run start:dev
scripts.restart:dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml restart proxy api client fingerprint_worker identification_worker
scripts.rm-services:dev-prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev-prod.yml rm proxy api client fingerprint_worker identification_worker
scripts.start:dev-prod--recreate: npm run rm-services:dev-prod && npm run start:dev-prod
scripts.start:dev-prod--recreate-proxy: npm run rm-services:dev-prod-proxy && npm run start:dev-prod
scripts.start:dev-prod-recreate-client: npm run rm-services:dev-prod-client && npm run start:dev-prod
scripts.start:dev-prod-recreate-api: npm run rm-services:dev-prod-api && npm run start:dev-prod
scripts.start:dev-prod-recreate-fingerprint-work: npm run rm-services:dev-prod-fingerprint-worker && npm run start:dev-prod
scripts.start:dev-prod-recreate-records-worker: npm run rm-services:dev-prod-records-worker && npm run start:dev-prod
scripts.restart:dev-prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev-prod.yml restart proxy api client fingerprint_worker identification_worker

author: Alexander Greff
